name: Danny Meyer
bio: Danny Meyer is a New York City-based musician and computer programmer. His credits as a multi-instrumentalist include performing, recording and touring internationally with the likes of Julia Holter, Chairlift, ExoTech, Live Footage and others. He is currently writing a programming language for composing microtonal music geometrically and participates in on-going projects with dancers, video artists, poets, photographers and other musicians and programmers.

charity.name: This Concert Series
bio: I played this concert in order to raise money to fund this concert series. We raised about $1,500 and that was all used to pay artists for future concerts. Very cool.
